sections.purpose: To dry crude drugs, plant powders, and ash residues at controlled temperatures.
sections.scope: Applicable to drying and sterilization by dry heat in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Load samples on perforated trays allowing air circulation.
Set temperature and time (e.g., 105Â°C for 3 hours for loss on drying).
Remove samples after cooling in a desiccator.
precautions: Do not place plastic or volatile materials.
